title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Brown ground beef and add onion and garlic.
Combine meat mixture with tomato sauce and simmer.
Toss spaghetti with sauce and top with Parmesan cheese.

title: Chicken TikkaMasala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Cook chicken in a tandoor or oven.
Make a creamy tomato sauce with curry powder.
Combine cooked chicken with sauce and serve with naan bread.
